data.title: The North Star
data.text:
Welcome!

Welcome to The North Star Bar and Restaurant in Boston's West End! We provide a modern and lively sports bar atmosphere with an impressive drink list, bistro-style menu, and events happening daily.

Learn More

Go Bruins and Celtics!

Join us almost any day of the week to cheer on and watch the Boston Bruins and Celtics! We are located just a few blocks from TD Garden, so we provide a great place to either stop by on your way to the game, or hang out and watch it with us!

View Sport Schedule

Our Menu

Check out our new menu with a variety of appetizers, burgers, sandwiches, salads, entrees and more! Including our Saturday and Sunday Brunch of Champions!

View Menus

Nightlife

Every Friday and Saturday night, join us at 10pm for Boston's best DJs spinning hip-hop, reggae, and party jams for a night full of dancing!

Upcoming DJ Schedule

Voted Boston's Best Bar to Watch College Football

Thank you to CBS Boston for naming The North Star "Boston's Best Bar" to watch College Football. Join us every weekend to tailgate and cheer on your favorite team!

View the Article

Functions

Whether it's a small group reservation, a sports game celebration, a large get together or a holiday party, let The North Star host your next event.

Book Functions / Private Parties
